text: At lunchtime, in the school cafeteriaー
Amidst the rowdy Taimanin students, I was partaking in lunch with Shikanosuke and Hebiko.

name: Uehara Shikanosuke
text: Mmmm. Mommy's tamagoyaki is so good! *Nom nom*

name: Aishu Hebiko
text: Wow, that looks delicious! Shikanosuke-chan, is it your mother's home cooking?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Yup! Would you like to try some?

name: Hebiko
text: Really? Yaaay. Well then, thank you very much! *Om nom* Ehehe, so sweet and delicious♪

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hehe~, right!? Getting this exquisite sweetness takes pro-level techniques~

name: Hebiko
text: That's true... It's never that tasty when Hebiko makes it.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Ah. But that might actually be good, you know?

name: Hebiko
text: Why?

name: Shikanosuke
text: If you could make tasty tamagoyaki on your own, you would scarf it down, wouldn't you?

name: Shikanosuke
text: And you'd put on more and more weight... like that giant octopus monster from the folk tales...

name: Hebiko
text: Like a kraken!? Oh c'mon, Hebiko can't get that huge!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hehe... that carelessness will do you in...

name: Hebiko
text: I-It's not carelessness! Shikanosuke-chan, when you're like this, you're so... right, Fuma-chan!?

name: Hebiko
text: ...Fuma-chan? Are you listening?

name: Me
text: Ah?
I looked up from the book I had been reading as Hebiko suddenly included me in the conversation.
I was reading a book while eating the daily lunch setーin a display of dexterous eating ability, to toot my own horn.

name: Hebiko
text: Hey, hey, Fuma-chan. Were you listening to what Heberybody was saying?

name: Me
text: Yeah. Of course I was.

name: Hebiko
text: Get outta here. You've been reading the whole time. Besides, reading a book while eating is bad manners, you know?

name: Me
text: Manners schmanners, it's just you two. Besides, I have been listening to you.

name: Hebiko
text: Really?

name: Me
text: You got fat again, didn't you, Hebiko? Because you stuff your face with all the tamagoyaki you made for yourself.

name: Hebiko
text: You're completely wrong!!

name: Me
text: Oh, is that so...?
Well, I couldn't deny that I had only been listening with one ear.
As I was still tilting my head, Shikanosuke asked me with a curious look on his face.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Is that an interesting book? I know you're a bookworm, but it's rare for you to go so far as reading while eating.

name: Me
text: Nah, more so than interesting, I'd say it's... practical.

name: Hebiko
text: A practical book?

name: Me
text: Yeah. It's a book about stuff like sorcery and ancient rituals.

name: Shikanosuke & Hebiko
text:
Shikanosuke: Oooh
Hebiko: Sorcery...?
The two still looked at me curiously.

name: Me
text: This book is... I mean, do you remember? When I was stabbed by Gaiza and almost died?
It had been more than "almost." My heart had gotten pierced and I had completely died once.

name: Hebiko
text: Yeah. That happened.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Yeah. At that time Hebiko kept bawling and it was really tough.

name: Hebiko
text: Sh-Shikanosuke-chan! Don't talk about that!

name: Me
text: D-Did she...? Anyways, somehow I didn't die and came back to life.

name: Hebiko
text: Right! Hebiko was so surprised~

name: Shikanosuke
text: Yup! I didn't expect you to awaken to a Ninja Art of healing~

name: Shikanosuke
text: We even held an impromptu party for that!!

name: Hebiko
text: That party was soooo fun. Ehehe.

name: Me
text: L-Let's set the party aside... So after that I went to find out what had happened to me in detail.

name: Me
text: You know him too, right? Kiryu-sensei, who's always holed up in the underground lab of the academy.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Ahhh, that guy. We met him on the mission before.

name: Hebiko
text: He's a weird guy. It's surprising you were willing to go and ask him to investigate, Fuma-chan.

name: Me
text: I mean, it seems like he's skilled... So I had to do this, that, and the other, but I finally got him to examine meー
Indeedー. The result of that examination had also been problematic.

name: Kiryu Sabato
text: Hmm, so this is err... this is not a Ninja Art.

name: Me
text: ...Excuse me?
I could only counter with a question after having it declared so plainly.
At this point I had returned from my errand to the black market broker's store and the brief examination had concluded.
After looking at the results of his examination, demonologist Kiryu Sabato had spoken completely unfazed.

name: Kiryu
text: There is no evidence of Taima Particles being used in your Regeneration.

name: Kiryu
text: In other words, you are still a dick cheese stain who can't use Ninja Arts.

name: Me
text: Ehh!? Th-Then...
Taima Particles were like the driving force that allowed Taimanin to use Ninja Arts.
Those connected to a Taimanin lineage were born with the ability to control Taima Particlesー
And this ability allowed them to command various Ninja Arts that did not follow the normal laws of physics.

name: Me
text: (But if this ability was different, thenー)

name: Kiryu
text: It's obvious. If this is not a Ninja Art, then it's the power of "demons."

name: Me
text: D-Demons!?
I accidentally raised my voice.
The power of demons was something mainly used by the inhabitants of the Devildom.
It was a power that didn't follow the natural principles of the human world.
There were theories that Taima Particles were a part of the same power, but in that regard, researchers' opinions differed, and it was a confusing topic, so I wasn't sure what to think either.
But there was an even more pressing questionー

name: Me
text: (Why can I use the power of demons...?)

name: Kiryu
text: If I recall, you said your body worked better after your death... or something like that, didn't you?

name: Me
text: Yes, I guess...
Kiryu-sensei continued talking while I was still in a daze.
I had also told him everything that had happened at the broker's store.

name: Kiryu
text: Hmm... I guess that's also because you awakened to the power of demons.

name: Kiryu
text: And this is just a hypothesis, but... the more you die, the more your power will awaken.

name: Me
text: Th-The more I die!? That's ridiculous... Wait, Kiryu-sensei, what are you doing...?
Kiryu-sensei had rummaged through his equipment and pulled out a very thick syringe.

name: Kiryu
text: Hehehehe, such an interesting lab rat wandered right in front of me... Ah, no, it's nothing.

name: Kiryu
text: It just looks like your body needs some more thorough tests. Come on, have a seat right there, Fuma-kun.

name: Me
text: Wh-What are you gonna do...?

name: Kiryu
text: It's alright, it won't hurt.

name: Me
text: What won't hurt!?
I quickly stepped back upon smelling danger. And thenー

name: Kiryu
text: Oh, shut up already!! One more death will help clear things up, so just let me kill you!!

name: Me
text: N-No way!! I won't die for your experiment!!
And, fearing for my life, I had desperately made my escape from the underground lab.

name: Hebiko
text: The power of demons...?

name: Shikanosuke
text: So you didn't awaken to your Ninja Art, Fuma...
Hebiko and Shikanosuke looked quite surprised as well.

name: Me
text: Yeah. I was shocked too...

name: Me
text: (What the hell is going on with my body...)
To be honest, I had thought, "Knew it," when I was told that it wasn't a Ninja Art.
There were almost no examples of people as old as me awakening to their Ninja Art.
And I myself hadn't felt like I had awoken to my Ninja Art either.

name: Me
text: (That being said, the power of demons...)
I recalled what the snake woman had told me in Chaos Arena when Hebiko had been abducted.

name: Snake Lady
text: Your eye, your "lost right eye"♪ It has a bedeviling secretー

name: Me
text: (A bedeviling secret...? Shit!! I'm getting more and more confused...)
The "secret" that that snake woman had mentioned... was it related to the power of demons that apparently was within me...?
As I was getting lost in my thoughts to some extentー

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hmm. What do you think, Hebiko? Should we throw another party?

name: Hebiko
text: You're right. The power of demons is different from a Ninja Art, so Hebiko thinks it's okay to celebrate once more.
Hebiko and Shikanosuke were discussing frivolous matters.

name: Me
text: N-No, we don't need to have a party... I mean, aren't you guys worried?

name: Me
text: I have the power of demonsーwhich means I'm a being similar to inhabitants of the Devildom, like Incubi or Orcs.

name: Hebiko
text: Hm? But, Fuma-chan, you always seemed to be thinking about lewd things. You becoming an Incubus wouldn't really change anything.

name: Shikanosuke
text: True. Fuma, you've always been a pervert, so I wouldn't bat an eye if someone told me you were an Orc!

name: Me
text: I-I see... I mean I'm not actually an Incubus or an Orc per se... but thanks.
I smiled and nodded at my two friends.
Even if I turned out to be some weird creature, they would treat me the sameーthat fact somehow made me happy.

name: Me
text: Anyways, it seems safe to say my regeneration ability wasn't a Ninja Art after all.

name: Me
text: So then thought I wanted to do some research about it.

name: Hebiko
text: Hmm. And that's why you were reading a book about sorcery. You're very studious, aren't you, Fuma-chan?
Finally Hebiko and Shikanosuke looked convinced. At that momentー

name: Fuma Saika
text: Young Lord. I found the books you were looking for, so I brought them here.

name: Me
text: Oh. Thanks, Saika.
Fuma Saika had arrived, carrying several books in her arms.

name: Shikanosuke & Hebiko
text:
Shikanosuke: Ah, hello Saika-san!
Hebiko: Hello!

name: Saika
text: Yes, good afternoon, Aishu-san, Uehara-kun.
Hebiko, Shikanosuke, and Saika, all familiar with one another, exchanged greetings.
Saika used to be my father's secretary, and after various things happened and he died...
she had stayed at the Fuma residence with Tokiko and the others to serve me.
In particular, Saika was tasked with managing the residence and books that had been passed down in the Fuma head family by my father.

name: Me
text: Were they hard to find?

name: Saika
text: No, not at all. Your instructions were very easy to understand, Young Lord.

name: Me
text: I see. That's good to hear.

name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan, are those books also related to the sorcery stuff you were talking about before?

name: Me
text: Yes. This time, I wanted to delve into it deeply, so I had Saika assist me.

name: Hebiko
text: So that's why. Thank you for your efforts, Saika-san.

name: Saika
text: Ah, no, not at all... It's a pleasure to help the Young Lord.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Mmm, how nice, Fuma. I wish I had a kind secretary like Saika-san...

name: Me
text: D-Don't be silly. When Saika's strict, she's super strict... right?
It somehow made me embarrassed when someone complimented a member of my clan. I spoke to Saika a little bluntly.

name: Saika
text: Hehe, yes I am. When it's called for, I am strict, of course...
Saika smiled slightly and gave me a respectful bow.

name: Saika
text: Well, Young Lord, my business here is done, so I'll be taking my leave.

name: Me
text: Oh? If it's alright, how about you have lunch with us?

name: Saika
text: No, I still have work left to do. So don't worry about me and enjoy the time with your friendsー
Then Saika nodded as if she had suddenly remembered something.

name: Saika
text: Ah, before thatーYoung Lord, I have been asked to deliver a message from Headmistress Igawa.

name: Saika
text: After the afternoon training, she wants you to come to her office with Aishu-san and Uehara-kun. It seems she has a new mission for you.

name: Me
text: A mission? I wonder what it is.

name: Saika
text: I do not know the details... but she said it wasn't that difficult of a mission.

name: Me
text: Hmm?
*Ding-dong*...
While we were talking, the bell for the end of lunch break rang.

name: Me
text: Ah, lunchtime is already over!? Thanks, Saika!!
I said to Saika and shoveled what was left of my lunch into my mouth.
If I didn't hurry, the afternoon combat training would start before I got there.

name: Saika
text: Well then, Young Lord. Aishu-san, Uehara-kun, please look after the Young Lord.

name: Shikanosuke & Hebiko
text:
Shikanosuke: It's no problem, Saika-san!
Hebiko: O~kay. Roger♪
Saika politely said goodbye to those two, who had long ago finished lunch, and then left.

name: Me
text: (Ugh!? Am I the only one who hasn't finished eating...!?)
I suppose it might not have been that good of an idea to read a book while eating...
While I thought about that, I hurried and set my chopsticks into motion.
